m_szDocTitle: FFP New Hydro To Deliver 21 Hydroelectric Projects On Existing US Dams
m_szDocSumamry: FFP New Hydro To Deliver 21 Hydroelectric Projects On Existing US Dams August 28th, 2015 by Joshua S Hill   FFP New Hydro has acquired the finances to continue developing its advanced hydroelectric power projects on existing dams in the US. FFP New Hydro, majority owned by an affiliate of US Renewable Group, itself one of the largest investment firms focused exclusively on the renewable energy industry, announced Tuesday that it had closed a senior loan facility with Crestline Investors, and acquired and integrated Rye Development, FFP New Hydro’s manager, into the company.
